name: OpenEBPP - Electronic Bill Pres & Pay
short_description: OpenEBPP is an open implementation of Electronic Bill Presentment and Payment for Billers, BSP (Billing Service Providers), CSP (Consumer Service Providers) and Customers. The goal is to create a suite of interoperable EBPP components.
